amendment.description: Throughout the Act, insert `or gender identity' after `sexual orientation' each place it appears. ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 110-422 to expand ENDA's protections to persons discriminated against based on gender identity, defined as the gender-related identity, appearance, or mannerisms or other gender-related characteristics of an individual, with or without regard to the individual's designated sex at birth. The amendment includes language concerning shared facilities, dress, and grooming standards, as well as a paragraph stating that the construction of additional facilities are not required.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Baldwin amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Baldwin.
